Tolkien-related events that took place in 1894.

content.title: February
content.content: 17 - Hilary Arthur Reuel Tolkien, younger brother to J.R.R. Tolkien, is born in Bloemfontein, South Africa.

content.title: October
content.content: 18 - Geoffrey Bache Smith, childhood friend of Tolkien, is born.

content.title: November
content.content:
Mabel, Hilary, and Ronald take a train to the coast near Cape Town so Ronald can be in the cooler air.
After they return home a trip to England is decided as Mabel dislikes the hot climate and the Bloemfontein lifestyle, even though Arthur is happy with it.

content.title: Christmas
content.content:
"My first Christmas memory is of blazing sun, drawn curtains and a drooping eucalyptus" (Letter 163)
